channel.title: Posts on Arts and Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Arts and Engineering

item.title: Real Time Finger Detection
item.description: Introduction In this software project we use image processing techniques on a single area of a live video feed to identify the number of fingers on display. The main image processing technique used is identifying contours. A contour is created by joining all the continuous points of an image that have the same color. Contours can be used for various image processing programs like shape analysis, object detection or recognition. Image contouring is an important tool with uses in any field.
